_json.gridTitle: Our Shop - Rest Ministries - Chronic Illness and Pain Support
_json.description: How to Live Right When Your Life Goes Wrong - LOVE this book and personally know the author who is a terrific counselor!  Here is what the book will help you do: --> Gain a new perspective on the troubles God allows in your life. --> Come to better understand your response to those trials. --> Discover the underlying idols that hamper your efforts to change.  Learn how to discern the truth of God's Word. --> Develop the heart response that will draw you closer to God.
